void ArrayIncludesIndexofAssembler::GeneratePackedDoubles(SearchVariant variant, TNode<FixedDoubleArray> elements, TNode<Object> search_element, TNode<Smi> array_length, TNode<Smi> from_index) { ... }
// Preconditions/guards: receiver is fast JSArray; elements_kind == PACKED_DOUBLE_ELEMENTS. fromIndex Smi is untagged. Handles NaN via dedicated nan_loop for includes; vectorized SIMD call possible. Returns True/False or index.
explanation: Fast path for PACKED_DOUBLE_ELEMENTS: uses direct double comparisons, handles NaN specially for includes (NaN==NaN), supports SIMD acceleration, returns quickly when found.
